The video footage showed a dam with an e: which was claimed to be Ajwa dam in Gujarat after heavy rain in Vadodara.
The video was initially broadcasted by G: with the anchor mentioning that water from 62 gates of Ajwa dam was being released.
News 18 Gujarati also tweeted the video: clarifying that it was from Ajwa dam and not from Niagara falls.
However: a Twitter user named Aravind Chaudhari alerted Alt News that the visuals relayed by the broadcaster were old and unrelated to Ajwa dam. Alt News later confirmed that the video was actually from Hatnur dam in Maharashtra, with 41 gates opened and 2.38 lakh cusec water released.
